text: Hongyun Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the seat of Dingcheng District in Changde Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. Dividing a part of the former Wuling Town (), the subdistrict was formed in 2013. It has an area of with a population of 34,900 (as of 2013).湖南省民政厅（湘民行发〔2013〕32号: 撤销鼎城区武陵镇，设立玉霞、红云、郭家铺3个街道。红云街道辖花船庙、善池、德安、停车场、红云、西站、福广7个社区，总人口3.49万人，总面积11.26平方千米，办事处驻善池社区. see changde.gov.cn (Jan.2, 2014) , baidu.com, changde.gov.cn (2014-01-23) or house.qq.com (2014-01-23) ==References== ==External links== * Official Website (Chinese / 中文) Category:Dingcheng District Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Hongyun Subdistrict
